mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memId, memPw, memNm, nickNm, address1, address2, zipCode, phone, email, profilePath, deleteYn, regDt, modDt) VALUES (#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memNm}, #{nickNm}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{zipCode}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{profilePath}, #{deleteYn}, now(), NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT memNo, memId, memPw, nickNm, address1, address2, zipCode, phone, email, profilePath, deleteYn, regDt, modDt FROM member WHERE memNo = #{memNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET deleteYn = 'y' WHERE memNo = #{memNo}
